short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below.δεςit is found that the list of required items consists of vehicular parts, engine components, hydraulic equipment, filter and foulground transportation hose related parts, civil common bombs, and misc.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items listed below. To be delivered at 25 CFSD Montreal and 7 CFSD Edmonton by February 28th, 2023.
tags: Filter and Foulground Transportation Hose Related Parts
full_summary:
### Material Handling Equipment – Spare Parts Buy

#### Tender Information

- **Title (English)**: Material Handling Equipment – Spare Parts Buy
- **Title (French)**: Équipement de manutention du matériel – Achat de pièces de rechange
- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01013825
- **Solicitation Number**: W8486-238874/A
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Tender Status (English)**: Expired
- **Tender Status (French)**: Expiré
- **Publication Date**: November 17, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: January 10, 2023, 2:00 p.m. Eastern Standard Time
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
- **Regions of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region) and Alberta

#### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites proposals for the procurement of spare parts for various material handling equipment items, including but not limited to:

- Hose Crimping Machines
- Hose Assemblies
- Pneumatic Tires
- Mufflers
- Engine Starters
- Hydraulic Pumps
- Pressure Transmitters
- and other related equipment.

#### Tender Specification

The following goods are required in specific quantities and delivery areas:

- Item 1: 2 x Hose Crimping Machines, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 2: 2 x Hose Crimping Machines, delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta
- Item 3: 5 x Hose Assemblies, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 4: 2 x Clamping Tools, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 5: 2 x Clamping Tools, delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta
- Item 6: 2 x Pneumatic Tires, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 7: 2 x Pneumatic Tires, delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta
- Item 8: 5 x Mufflers, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 9: 10 x Engine Starters, delivery to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec
- Item 10: 8 x Engine Starters, delivery to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta
- Item 11: 5 x Hydraulic Pumps, delivery
